author: Sanjeev Miglani
title: Most of India under lockdown as coronavirus appears in small towns
description: Police enforced lockdowns across large parts of India on Tuesday, with curfews in some places, as health officials warned that the coronavirus was spreading out of big cities where it first appeared into the small towns that dot the landscape.
